{{Description|The only reason to walk in the darkness is to light it up. Behold, that fleeing light in the dead of night is the herald of the coming dawn.}}
'''Dawn''' is [[Diluc]]'s [[Elemental Burst]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* {{TalentNote|energy frame|24}}<ref name="Genshin Academy burst info sheet">GenshinAcademy: [https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1iLUT8Tafwih3RZbNlA59w6-x5NQdgPvsMc86b7W92DQ/edit#gid=0 Elemental Burst Frame Tests]</ref>
* {{TalentNote|cooldown frame|16}}<ref name="Genshin Academy burst info sheet" />
* The {{Pyro}} infusion refreshes once every 0.5 seconds and will remain when switching to another character.

;<big>Passive Effects</big>
* {{TalentNote|character=Diluc|talent=Dawn|ascension|2|Blessing of Phoenix}}

;<big>Constellation Effects</big>
* {{TalentNote|constellation|5|Phoenix, Harbinger of Dawn}}
